name: 𝐇𝐀𝐋𝐋𝐎𝐕-𝐗𝐌𝐃
description: Best whatsapp bot developed by femshulez

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be read automatically (type yes to activate or no to deactivate; don't use capital letters)

AUTO_LIKE_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be reacted to automatically (type yes to activate or no to deactivate; don't use capital letters)

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be downloaded automatically and sent to you (type yes to activate or no to deactivate; don't use capital letters)

PM_PERMIT.description: Other users can't use your bot in PM (type yes to activate or no to deactivate; don't use capital letters)

BOT_NAME.description: Put a name for your bot

BOT_MENU_LINKS.description: Add one or many links for your bot menu; e.g., url1,url2,url3.....

PUBLIC_MODE.description: Type yes to put your bot on public mode or no to put it on private mode

SESSION_ID.description: Put your session ID, the code you receive after scanning QR code

NUMERO_OWNER.description: Your number, don't put '+' and put your area code (e.g., for Togo '228')

WARN_COUNT.description: This is the limit for warning commands

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: If you don't want a starting bot message, put no; otherwise, put yes

PRESENCE.description: Mark your presence: 1 to indicate that you are online even if you are not. 2 to indicate that you are currently typing a message. 3 to indicate that you are currently recording audio. Or leave the field blank to indicate your real state.

ANTIDELETE2.description: If you want to enable anti-delete messages, put yes; otherwise, put no

ANTIDELETE1.description: If you want to enable anti-delete messages, put yes; otherwise, put no
